God has placed on us a burden of responsibility that we do not recognize. We must learn deeper lessons in the school of Christ. We can do much in his strength. He would have us teach the students how to take up the work he has left them to do, that they may not lose the spirit of the work by too close an appreciation of the theory 


                                -128- 

of the truth. It is an intelligent knowledge made perfect by practice that makes an efficient worker.
